scripts.build: cd src && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf build/* && cp -r src/build/* build/ && echo 'Build artifacts copied successfully'
scripts.heroku-postbuild: mkdir -p build && npm run build && echo 'Verifying build artifacts:' && ls -la build/ && if [ -d build/static ]; then ls -la build/static/; fi && if [ -d build/static/css ]; then ls -la build/static/css/; fi && if [ -f build/index.html ]; then echo 'HTML file contains CSS:' && grep -i css build/index.html || echo 'No CSS found in HTML'; fi && echo 'Heroku build completed'
